name: Whomp! Ronnie's Bubbles
description:
Ronnie's Bubbles is a simple but challenging bubble-bouncing game where your goal is to reach Pluto.

At first it will seem difficult, but soon, you'll be getting there no problem, and you will be entirely bored with the game!

I made this game all on my own, because while I draw comics for a living (that you can find at whompcomic.com), my first love has always been video games.

A successful run of a game is usually going to be less than 10 minutes, so please only give what you think is worth it for such a short time. (Or better yet, play it first before giving any money!)

I hope you enjoy this little thing I made!

Music by Teknoaxe: https://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe
